2065970.name: Wild Delivery: Old Cooking Style
2065970.description:
FEATURES

  • Old Style Cooking Simulator: Use old kitchen tools and natural resources to get orders on time
  • Animals: Feed and care for animals to get resources
  • Fast delivery: Manage resources, money and time well so as not to end up bankrupt!
  • Recipe Book: Get new recipes to improve the restaurant
  • No Inventory: There is no inventory, you can only take one type of item at a time. You will not be able to see anything if you pick up many objects of the same type at the same time
2065970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
